messages.subject: RE: fire trucks
messages.msgSnippet: We may be going to another fire station tomorrow night for Halloween.  Maybe I ll get another chance to see the top of a hook and ladder truck   ;-) To truly
messages.messageBody:
We may be going to another fire station tomorrow night for Halloween. Maybe
I'll get another chance to see the top of a hook and ladder truck ;-)

To truly understand my interest, you have to realize that I am terrified of
heights. Several years ago, we went to Disneyland to the Treehouse (I think
it is the Jungle Book now). I hardly got up far at all and I started
shaking. By the time I reached the top, I was shaking uncontrollably and
had to hold the handrail with a deathgrip so I didn't fall down the stairs.

Annie
--
www.naturallynhkids.com
Great parenting is a great career! Ask me how ...
